author: Special Correspondent
text:
G. Kolunji (35), one of the three critically injured victims of Monday’s fire accident at a cracker unit in Madhyasenai near here, succumbed to burns on Wednesday. Police said that the woman, who had sustained nearly 80 per cent burns, died at a private hospital in Madurai around 4 a.m.

The condition of the two others — Nagappan and Shanmugathai — remained critical.

Four others, who had sustained minor injuries in the accident, are undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Sivakasi.

Amathur police have arrested three employees of the unit for negligence.

Chemical pellets that were being dried up went up in flames due to friction on the drying platform around 2 p.m. at the unit on Monday.

title: Cracker unit fire: one succumbs to burns
